mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.trusts_id AS "trusts", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM my_classes a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.trusts_id LIKE '%'||#{trusts}||'%' '%'+#{trusts}+'%' concat('%',#{trusts},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_classes( id, name, trusts_id, create_date, update_date, remarks, create_by, update_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{trusts}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE my_classes SET name = #{name}, trusts_id = #{trusts}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
